removals.expression: (dot + ((alpha * A[(i * nk + k)]) * B[(k * nj + j)]))
removals.replacement: dot + (alpha * A[i * nk + k] * B[k * nj + j])
removals.reasoning: The outer parentheses around the addition are redundant. Multiplication binds tighter than addition, so writing `dot + (alpha * A[...] * B[...])` is equivalent and clearer; inner index parentheses were removed as well.
Array index parentheses are unnecessary.
The parentheses around the entire multiplication are redundant in an assignment RHS.

Index expression does not need additional parentheses.
